mapper.sql: ID as id, PACKAGEID as packageid, BET_TYPE_CODE as betTypeCode, MONEY_MODE as moneyMode, TOTBETS as totbets, TOTAMOUNT as totamount, MULTIPLE as multiple, BET_DETAIL as betDetail, CREATE_TIME as createTime, FILE_MODE as fileMode, MUTI_AWARD as mutiAward, EVALUATE_AWARD as evaluateAward, RET_POINT_CHAIN as retPointChain, AWARD_MODE as awardMode, RET_AWARD as retAward
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_GAME_PACKAGE_ITEM_ID.Nextval from dual
INSERT INTO GAME_PACKAGE_ITEM ( ID , PACKAGEID , BET_TYPE_CODE , MONEY_MODE , TOTBETS , TOTAMOUNT , MULTIPLE , BET_DETAIL , CREATE_TIME , FILE_MODE , MUTI_AWARD , EVALUATE_AWARD , RET_POINT_CHAIN, AWARD_MODE, RET_AWARD, ret_point, DIAMOND_AMOUNT ) VALUES ( #{id,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{packageid,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{betTypeCode,javaType=string,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{moneyMode,javaType=integer,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{totbets,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{totamount,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{multiple,javaType=integer,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{betDetail,javaType=string,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , #{createTime,javaType=date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{fileMode,javaType=integer,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{mutiAward,javaType=integer,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{evaluateAward,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{retPointChain,javaType=string,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{awardMode,javaType=integer,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{retAward,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{retPoint,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{diamondAmount,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
mapper.update: UPDATE GAME_PACKAGE_ITEM SET PACKAGEID = #{packageid,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , BET_TYPE_CODE = #{betTypeCode,javaType=string,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , MONEY_MODE = #{moneyMode,javaType=integer,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , TOTBETS = #{totbets,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , TOTAMOUNT = #{totamount,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , MULTIPLE = #{multiple,javaType=integer,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , BET_DETAIL = #{betDetail,javaType=string,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,javaType=date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , FILE_MODE = #{fileMode,javaType=integer,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , MUTI_AWARD = #{mutiAward,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , EVALUATE_AWARD = #{evaluateAward,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , RET_POINT_CHAIN = #{retPointChain,javaType=string,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AWARD_MODE=#{awardMode,javaType=integer,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RET_AWARD=#{retAward,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select:
select
from GAME_PACKAGE_ITEM where PACKAGEID = #{packageId} order by id

select from GAME_PACKAGE_ITEM where id in
#{item}
